pageProps.content:
# Oatmeal Porridge

Serves 2


## Ingredients

* 1 cup oats
* 3 cups milk or water
* 1tsp cinnamon
* 1Tb butter
* 1/4tsp salt


## Extras

* brown/raw sugar
* honey


## Method

1. 4m-6m in pressure cooker with quick release


## Notes
